[00:00.00]Killer (Remix|Explicit) - Eminem/Jack Harlow/Cordae
[00:00.12]Lyrics by：M Mathers/D. Doman/E. Chikwendu/Jack Harlow/Cordae
[00:00.29]Composed by：M Mathers/D. Doman/E. Chikwendu/Jack Harlow/Cordae
[00:00.46]Eminem/Jack Harlow：
[00:00.50]Killer
[00:01.71]
[00:02.72]Yeah
[00:03.08]
[00:03.79]I'm a
[00:04.07]Boy's crazy
[00:04.55]I'm a cold-blooded
[00:05.29]Killer
[00:06.48]Made all this money from doin' this
[00:07.54]Yeah look
[00:07.85]
[00:08.42]d.a. got that d**e
[00:09.53]Eminem：
[00:09.68]Now count it five ten yeah fifteen twenty
[00:12.11]Twenty-five thirty yeah get the money
[00:14.52]Throw it in the furnace yeah this s**t be funny
[00:16.97]Earn it just to burn it swag drip
[00:18.62]Jack Harlow：
[00:18.88]I used to rock a toboggan
[00:20.11]Headphones around my neck tryna be like Shady
[00:22.46]Now the phone that's in my pocket seem to keep vibratin'
[00:24.85]I got all these Ronnie Bennetts tryna be my baby
[00:27.28]Tryna fiancé me
[00:28.45]I take the steering wheel and drive them girls beyond crazy
[00:31.11]Crazy
[00:31.58]I'm on a song with my idol
[00:32.78]I'm a cold-blooded version of the song title
[00:35.09]I put these diamonds in the ring like they was Shawn Michaels
[00:37.53]I can't put the Louis V inside the wash cycle
[00:40.06]I take this s**t to the cleaners
[00:41.97]'Bout to cop me a Bimmer I got a special demeanor
[00:44.25]She was mine when I seen her I'm gettin' meaner and meaner
[00:46.68]Called the front desk and asked for a steamer
[00:48.69]I'm a b***h bagger not a Twitch streamer
[00:50.87]I'm eatin' pizza in Little Italy d**n I used to hit Caesars
[00:53.80]She 'bout to finish but wait a minute it gets deeper
[00:56.40]Same kid just a bit sleeker
[00:57.68]Eminem/Cordae：
[00:58.09]Now count it five ten yeah fifteen twenty
[01:00.58]Twenty-five thirty yeah get the money
[01:02.97]Throw it in the furnace yeah this s**t be funny
[01:05.42]Earn it just to burn it
[01:06.74]Listen uh
[01:07.51]Cordae：
[01:07.79]They say my killing's horrendous "How he still in the business"
[01:10.43]Rich as hell and it's feelin' tremendous
[01:12.27]Ma dukes chillin' in Venice compliments of her eldest descendant
[01:15.06]Give hell with these writtens this s**t only propel my ascension
[01:17.45]I held my position in any situation that's needed
[01:19.89]This year I'm s**ttin' on n***as for the way we was treated
[01:22.50]I see the impact of all my creations increasin'
[01:24.87]My step in time with these Pantheons it all was divine
[01:27.43]I'm in this moment of my life where s**t is fallin' in line
[01:29.75]And lookin' back I swear to god you'd think it all was designed
[01:32.20]A true movie script I can't really ever f**k no groupie b***h
[01:34.87]All she got is diamonds on her mind on some Uzi s**t
[01:37.41]A whole generation of geniuses I'm influencin'
[01:39.71]I only hang with real n***as who I'm congruent with
[01:42.02]I manifest nothing less than the best outcome
[01:44.86]Just watch my moves with this next album n***a
[01:46.73]Eminem：
[01:46.86]Now count it five ten yeah fifteen twenty
[01:49.14]Twenty-five thirty yeah get the money
[01:51.49]Throw it in the furnace yeah this s**t be funny
[01:53.90]Earn it just to burn it swag drippin' from me
[01:56.29]My sentences are harsh every single's bar's like a verdict
[01:58.78]I say it with conviction but this time you're not gonna serve it
[02:01.11]But as soon as I read it
[02:02.21]You know that you're about to get murdered
[02:03.66]When I cap it'll punish then put you in a box like a juror
[02:05.93]
[02:06.58]If there's a rapper I haven't ate
[02:07.88]Where
[02:08.18]We ain't battled either that or they won't collaborate
[02:10.59]'Cause pad or paper freestyle will settle that debate
[02:12.80]Yup
[02:13.22]I call it guillotine style 'cause even off the head I decapitate
[02:15.97]
[02:16.50]Yeah b***h I go harder than Carter III
[02:18.19]What
[02:18.45]But I think your thottie just thought of me
[02:19.65]She got a body and bottom like Cardi B
[02:20.71]And she be stalking me like I was broccoli
[02:21.86]I'm getting brain now like a lobotomy
[02:23.29]You probably thinkin' you had that s**t in the bag like it's colostomy
[02:25.66]It's a red alert you better skrrt or try to get on my level first
[02:28.25]B***h I'd had to shovel dirt and dig a hole to get on yours
[02:30.55]You bum-bum look at your broke a*s
[02:32.44]Yeah
[02:32.85]It's why you're a bum-bum
[02:33.63]Why
[02:33.83]'Cause your s**t is so a*s
[02:34.86]Yeah
[02:35.10]Syllable gun-guns spits and goes "Hadoo"
[02:37.28]Only L that I ever took was when I lost Proof
[02:39.55]Yeah
[02:39.79]Only time that I ever got served is that lawsuit when Ma sued
[02:42.62]What
[02:42.78]But b***h get out of pocket and I might accost you
[02:45.26]Homicides up the wazoo
[02:46.99]Chain gaudy probably got more bodi-odi-odies than John do
[02:49.72]John do
[02:50.12]Just called Snoop and I talked to him we all cool
[02:52.54]Dre me and the Dogg good Doc we got you
[02:54.92]Got a castle with a solid gold floor
[02:56.10]No I don't I don't even got a boat nor
[02:57.29]Do I got a chauffeur but a lot to show for
[02:58.88]You don't wanna f**k around and start no war
[02:59.74]Twenty more years I could probably go for
[03:00.89]Just like your lip and you got a cold sore
[03:02.15]My s**t is like motherf**kin' herpes
[03:03.17]You ain't ever gonna say I don't got it no more
[03:04.51]B***h
[03:04.67]Literally it's no quittin' me you kiddin' me
[03:05.87]Dying laughing is the only way you're killing me
[03:07.13]I'm getting rid of ya get clapped like chlamydia
[03:08.28]The wittiest b***h I'll snap like a tibia
[03:09.45]You wanna get silly with the bars
[03:10.38]I'm frivolous
[03:10.64]But I'm as gritty and litty as my city is
[03:11.99]East side 'til I die b***h
[03:12.78]I will rep 'til the end like a chameleon
[03:14.21]Got a killer instinct with the pen's ink
[03:15.68]And they're in sync like a faucet
[03:16.11]How the f**k do I even think of this ridiculous s**t
[03:17.59]I'm a quarter of a century deep and I can't be beat
[03:18.99]Nah
[03:19.21]'Til the day me and the grim reap meet
[03:20.21]I'm ten toes down 'til I'm six feet deep
[03:21.40]What
[03:21.62]Windows down in the Benz E jeep hollerin' at a bimbo
[03:23.36]Beep-beep-beep
[03:23.91]She said she f**ks with the M-T-B
[03:25.14]To the M-B Side B Slim CD
[03:26.36]I can see why you envy me you get no a*s like an empty seat
[03:28.98]So this s**t comes with a warning for all of you punks and you corny
[03:31.49]Little f**ks I woke up on my f**k s**t this morning
[03:33.30]Now count it five ten yeah fifteen twenty
[03:35.73]Twenty-five thirty yeah get the money
[03:38.11]Throw it in the furnace yeah this s**t be funny
[03:40.59]Earn it just to burn it swag drippin' from me
[03:42.63]Eminem/Jack Harlow：
[03:43.02]Yeah I'm a
[03:43.45]Killer
[03:44.27]
[03:46.32]Yeah I'm a what I'm a cold-blooded
[03:48.20]Killer
data.trans:
[ti:Killer (Remix|Explicit)]
[ar:Eminem/Jack Harlow/Cordae]
[al:Killer (Remix) (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.12]//
[00:00.29]//
[00:00.46]//
[00:00.50]杀手
[00:01.71]
[00:02.72]//
[00:03.08]
[00:03.79]我已
[00:04.07]变得疯狂
[00:04.55]我是一个冷血
[00:05.29]杀手
[00:06.48]靠着这份营生 挣了这么多钱
[00:07.54]瞧瞧
[00:07.85]
[00:08.42]d.a. got that d**e制作
[00:09.53]//
[00:09.68]现在数一数 五 十 十五 二十
[00:12.11]二十五 三十 好多钱
[00:14.52]把它丢进炉子里 真有趣
[00:16.97]赚了钱就要烧钱 我穿金戴银
[00:18.62]//
[00:18.88]我曾沉迷美色
[00:20.11]耳麦戴在脖子上 装得像Shady一样
[00:22.46]现在我口袋里的手机似乎一直在震动
[00:24.85]我让这些女孩都想做我的宝贝
[00:27.28]都想嫁作我的妻
[00:28.45]我掌控着方向 让这些女孩疯狂
[00:31.11]疯狂
[00:31.58]我在跟我的偶像合唱
[00:32.78]我是冷血版本的杀手
[00:35.09]我将钻石镶嵌在戒指上 像Shawn Michaels一样
[00:37.53]我不能把这路易威登丢进洗衣机
[00:40.06]我要把这玩意儿送去干洗店
[00:41.97]我准备买辆好车 我有种特别的风格
[00:44.25]我见到她的时候 她是属于我的 我变得越发刻薄
[00:46.68]打电话找前台要辆车 
[00:48.69]我是女性杀手 不是网游主播
[00:50.87]我在Little Italy吃着披萨 天呐 我以前都是去Caesars吃的
[00:53.80]她准备要结束 但是等等 我又投入了很多
[00:56.40]还是那个孩子 只是更加有风格
[00:57.68]//
[00:58.09]现在数一数 五 十 十五 二十
[01:00.58]二十五 三十 好多钱
[01:02.97]把它丢进炉子里 真有趣
[01:05.42]赚了钱就要烧钱
[01:06.74]听着
[01:07.51]//
[01:07.79]他们说我的杀人手段太过可怕 他怎么还在做这档子买卖
[01:10.43]富可敌国 感觉爽爆了
[01:12.27]我兄弟们在威尼斯度假 她的长子满口恭维的话 
[01:15.06]让这些文字都见鬼去吧 这只会加快我成功的速度
[01:17.45]在任何需要的情况下 我都能稳住地位
[01:19.89]今年我好好教训了这些家伙 以其人之道还治其人之身
[01:22.50]我看见我那些作品的影响慢慢扩大
[01:24.87]我的步调与众神一致 很是神圣
[01:27.43]我来到了人生的这一刻 一切都来到正轨
[01:29.75]回首过往 我向上帝起誓 你会觉得每件事都是设计好的
[01:32.20]真实的电影剧本 我不能真的跟女粉搞在一起
[01:34.87]她满心都是Uzi的那种钻石
[01:37.41]我影响了一个时代的天才
[01:39.71]我只跟与我合拍的兄弟一起混
[01:42.02]我得到了最好的结果
[01:44.86]看看我下一张专辑会有什么动作
[01:46.73]//
[01:46.86]现在数一数 五 十 十五 二十
[01:49.14]二十五 三十 好多钱
[01:51.49]把它丢进炉子里 真有趣
[01:53.90]赚了钱就要烧钱 我穿金戴银 
[01:56.29]我的审判很严厉 每一次都毫不留情
[01:58.78]我的判决很有说服力 但这次你不会再逃脱
[02:01.11]只要我注意到了你 
[02:02.21]你知道自己的死期会很快来临
[02:03.66]等我宣判死刑 把你像陪审员一样关起
[02:05.93]
[02:06.58]如果有哪个饶舌歌手我还没教训过
[02:07.88]在哪里
[02:08.18]我们没有比试过 否则他们不会跟我合作
[02:10.59]因为无准备的即兴说唱会解决争论
[02:12.80]//
[02:13.22]我将其称作断头台式饶舌 因为即使掉了脑袋 我也能去斩首
[02:15.97]
[02:16.50]没错 碧池 我的歌比那首《Carter III》厉害得多
[02:18.19]什么
[02:18.45]但我觉得你的女人想的是我
[02:19.65]她有Cardi B那样前凸后翘的身材
[02:20.71]她悄悄跟踪我 好像我是那让人上瘾的东西
[02:21.86]现在我被她成功拿下
[02:23.29]你可能以为自己已经胜券在握
[02:25.66]这是红色警报 你最好快跑 要不然就先达到我的水准
[02:28.25]碧池 我不得不弄开污秽之物 然后跟你肌肤相亲
[02:30.55]你这个蠢货 看看你那放荡的身体
[02:32.44]//
[02:32.85]这也是你无力抗拒的原因
[02:33.63]为什么
[02:33.83]因为你内心充满渴望
[02:34.86]//
[02:35.10]同步的动作 一起欢呼
[02:37.28]在我失去Proof的时候 我只觉得空虚
[02:39.55]//
[02:39.79]我唯一被法律制裁 是我妈妈起诉我的那时候
[02:42.62]什么
[02:42.78]但是 碧池 躲开一点 我可能会找你搭讪 
[02:45.26]杀人犯们成群结队
[02:46.99]华而不实的装饰品挂上的身体 可能会比John杀掉的尸体更多
[02:49.72]John杀掉的尸体
[02:50.12]给Snoop打去了电话 我跟他聊了聊 我们都很放松
[02:52.54]Dre 我和Dogg都很好 Doc 有我们陪着你
[02:54.92]拥有一座铺满坚硬金地板的城堡
[02:56.10]不 我甚至没有一艘船
[02:57.29]也没有司机 但还是有很多可以炫耀的
[02:58.88]你不想四处招惹 点燃战火
[02:59.74]再过二十年 我或许可以变得更牛
[03:00.89]就像你的嘴唇和你嘴唇上的疱疹
[03:02.15]我这个人可一点都不好惹
[03:03.17]你不会说我也就仅此而已了
[03:04.51]碧池
[03:04.67]说真的 没法摆脱我 你在逗我？
[03:05.87]让我笑死是你唯一能杀掉我的办法
[03:07.13]我要把你铲除 让你像细菌一样被消灭掉
[03:08.28]最机智的人物 我会让你大吃一惊
[03:09.45]你想要用你的钱使点小聪明吗
[03:10.38]我很轻浮
[03:10.64]但我跟我的城市一样坚韧不拔
[03:11.99]东部 直到我死去 碧池
[03:12.78]我会像变色龙一样为这里代言到最后
[03:14.21]拿上纸笔 杀手的本能觉醒
[03:15.68]灵感自动涌现
[03:16.11]我怎么能去想这可笑的事
[03:17.59]我已经称霸了二十五年 我不可能被打败
[03:18.99]//
[03:19.21]直到我跟死神见面的那天
[03:20.21]我都能专心致志 屹立不倒
[03:21.40]什么
[03:21.62]放下奔驰车的车窗 冲着一个女人大喊
[03:23.36]//
[03:23.91]她说她跟M-T-B搞在一起
[03:25.14]献给M-B 翻个面 薄薄的CD
[03:26.36]我能看出来你为什么嫉妒我 你没有容身之处
[03:28.98]所以这是给你们这些混混的警告
[03:31.49]小兔崽子 我一早起来就为我的谋杀行动做好了准备
[03:33.30]现在数一数 五 十 十五 二十
[03:35.73]二十五 三十 好多钱
[03:38.11]把它丢进炉子里 真有趣
[03:40.59]赚了钱就要烧钱 我穿金戴银
[03:42.63]//
[03:43.02]对 我是个
[03:43.45]杀手
[03:44.27]
[03:46.32]对 我是个 什么 我是一个冷血
[03:48.20]杀手
